title: (x) LJC logo - custom drawn {Stephen}
content: Can anyone ID the font on the LJC part of the LJC logo found at [http://www.nolimitonline.com/ljc/news.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20060518231821/http:/www.nolimitonline.com/ljc/news.php) ?
author: DjArcadian

comments.content: Most likely hand drawn or a customized font, like [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20060518231821/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.7.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=LJC&sampleSize=74).
